name: Chasys Draw Image File
summary: Learn about .CD5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Chasys Photo is a free image editing suite for Windows that includes tools for drawing, photo editing, image stacking, animation, and RAW photo processing. When a user saves their image as a project, the software creates a CD5 file to store its information.

The CD5 format supports multiple advanced features, including free-style layers with independent color modes, layer blending options, multiple resolutions, metadata storage, full alpha channel transparency, and multi-level lossless compression. It also supports animations, making it suitable for both still image editing and simple frame-based animation work.

description: A CD5 file is a project created by Chasys Photo (formerly Chasys Draw IES), a suite of image-editing and graphics applications. It stores all project information, including data for static images and animations, in a tag-based container format.

instructions: You can open and edit CD5 files using Chasys Photo on Windows. To open CD5 files with Chasys Photo, select File â†’ Open.
Chasys Photo can convert CD5 files to various image file types, including the following formats:
